member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC
member.summary: Describes how a shader resource is bound to a shader input.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the type of data in the resource.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC.BindCount
member.summary: Number of contiguous bind points for arrays.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC.uFlags
member.summary: A combination of -typed values for shader input-parameter options.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC.ReturnType
member.summary: If the input is a texture, the -typed value that identifies the return type.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC.Dimension
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the dimensions of the bound resource.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_INPUT_BIND_DESC.NumSamples
member.summary: The number of samples for a multisampled texture; when a texture isn't multisampled, the value is set to -1 (0xFFFFFFFF).
